entry.title: Trip to the Arctic
entry.content: In April 2025, I traveled to Utqiaġvik, Alaska, to support a sea ice field trip for local middle school students. While I was there in an instructional role, I also had the opportunity to learn hands-on techniques for measuring sea ice properties alongside the students. A personal highlight was teaching a live class (via Zoom) of my Ice and the Climate System course while standing on the frozen Arctic Ocean. More photos and stories are featured in the University of Illinois News Bureau feature.
